page.title: 08The Vet comes to Tongue
page.content: 'One day our little pet lamb fell ill.I went into the shed to feed him and I gasped. He was lying down. We had to call the {veterinary surgeon.} He came to our house and went to see the pet lamb. We kept our fingers crossed. The vet said the lamb had a fifty-fifty chance. He went back to the lamb and gave him an {injection and then went away. We gave the lamb a bedding of blankets and he was still asleep. The next morning we all went out and were relieved to see him up on his feet and bleating merrily.'
